Package dev.majek.pc.util

Class Chat

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.majek.pc.util.Chat
  • public class Chat
extends Object
    Class that handles all color codes (formatting/removing) within strings and parsing Strings into Components with fancy formatting like hover and click events.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Chat.InvalidJSONException
      Thrown if there is invalid syntax in the JSON Object for format(JSONObject).
      static class  Chat.InvalidMiniJSONException
      Thrown if there is invalid syntax in the Chat.MiniJSON object.
      static class  Chat.MiniJSON
      Handy in text formatting I call MiniJSON.

    • Method Detail

      • applyColorCodes

        public static String applyColorCodes​(String string,
                                     boolean blockDarkColors)
        This will translate 6 character and 3 character hex codes (&#rrggbb and &#rgb) and standard minecraft color codes (ex. &a, &7, etc.) to color.
        Parameters:
        string - The string to colorize.
        blockDarkColors - Whether or not to disallow colors that are too dark.
        Returns:
        Formatted string.

      • applyColorCodes

        public static String applyColorCodes​(String string)
        Apply color codes using applyColorCodes(String, boolean) and defaulting blockDarkColors to false.
        Parameters:
        string - The string to colorize.
        Returns:
        Formatted string.

      • removeColorCodes

        public static String removeColorCodes​(String string)
        Completely remove all color codes from a string. This will strip all standard codes and hex codes.
        Parameters:
        string - The string to remove colors from.
        Returns:
        Clean string.

      • getLuminescence

        public static double getLuminescence​(String color)
        Get luminescence of a formatted hex color - "&x&r&r&g&g&b&b".
        Parameters:
        color - The formatted hex string.
        Returns:
        Luminescence value 0-255.

      • getColorCodes

        public static String getColorCodes​(String string)
        Get only the color codes from a given string. This includes hex codes.
        Parameters:
        string - The string to remove color codes from.
        Returns:
        String of only color codes.

      • sendFormatted

        public static void sendFormatted​(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                                 String message)
        Parse any JSON for format(JSONObject) and Chat.MiniJSON and send the formatted string as a component to the CommandSender.
        Parameters:
        sender - The CommandSender to send the Component to.
        message - Expression to parse.

      • parseExpression

        public static net.kyori.adventure.text.Component parseExpression​(String message)
        Parse JSON for format(JSONObject) and Chat.MiniJSON within the provided message.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to parse.
        Returns:
        Component from the provided string.

      • format

        public static net.kyori.adventure.text.Component format​(org.json.simple.JSONObject jsonObject)
        Take a valid JSONObject in the correct format and convert it to a Component ready to send to a CommandSender.
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - The valid JSONObject.
        Returns:
        Valid Component.
        Throws:
        Chat.InvalidJSONException - If one of the JSONObjects in the JSONArray does not contain the "base-text" key.

      • format

        public static net.kyori.adventure.text.Component format​(String jsonString)
        Take a string containing valid JSON, parse it, and send it to format(JSONObject).
        Parameters:
        jsonString - The correctly formatted string to parse into a JSONObject.
        Returns:
        Valid Component.
        Throws:
        Chat.InvalidJSONException - If one of the jsonString is invalid JSON.

      • getComponentText

        public static net.kyori.adventure.text.TextComponent.Builder getComponentText​(String text)
        Get a TextComponent.Builder formatted with color from a String containing standard Minecraft color codes and hex codes (&#aabbcc).
        Parameters:
        text - The string with standard codes.
        Returns:
        TextComponent.Builder formatted with color.

      • isJson

        public static boolean isJson​(String Json)
        Check if a string is valid JSON.
        Parameters:
        Json - The string to check.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the JSON is valid.
